boardgame.name: Catch Phrase!
Pass Word
boardgame.description: Quick, rattle off as many clues until somebody on your team yells the word or phrase you want to hear. Get as physical as you want. Gesture. Say anything you want. Just keep talking. And keep passing. 'Cause if the buzzer goes off while you're holding the disk, the other guys get the point in CATCH PHRASE... the fast-passing, fast-talking game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameversion: Parker Brothers US flip-top box edition
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: TPGC - Episode #40 - Space Cadets Dice Duel and Catch Phrase w/ Jerry Reece and Stephen Buonocore

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

You can gesture and you can say anything else, but you you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got to do it fast, because they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got to say it before time runs out. With thousands of phrases across five cool categories, there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fun for everyone! Grab it, guess it, pass it! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the SCRABBLE CATCH PHRASE game everyone loves to play. Tick tock, this game of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hot potato_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; needs you to keep calm and talk fast. All you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got to do is describe the word or phrase displayed on the game unit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s LED screen. Once your team guesses correctly, pass the unit to the next team , and then carry on until the buzzer sounds. And make sure the other team is holding the game unit when the timer stops! Guess right, get points, win! Say it fast, play it fast! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a blast! Point, act, sing, dance, if you have to, just get your team to guess what_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s on the screen in the SCRABBLE CATCH PHRASE word game. Then pass the game unit on to the next team. Feel the action speed up as the timer ticks down to the final buzzer. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t panic. Get your friends to say the word or phrase on the screen, pass the unit, and the pressure is off... until it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your turn again. Once you pick it up, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tough to put it down! Let_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s get digital: It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the grab it, guess it, and pass it on word game in one handy portable electronic game unit complete with LED screen, timer, and built-in scorekeeper. SCRABBLE CATCH PHRASE is great to play anywhere and with any one. Stay on your toes with thousands of words and phrases selected from five cool categories. Put it on random, or choose your favorite category and start playing the SCRABBLE CATCH PHRASE word game today.
